titles.title: To grant an extension of authority for the establishment of the Thomas Paine Memorial, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Resources

bill.summary: 11/17/2003--Introduced. Extends the authority for the Thomas Paine National Historical Association to establish a memorial to Thomas Paine in the District of Columbia through December 31, 2006.
